page.title: 07BURNT HEATH FARM - OFFCHURCH
page.content: Managed with the{Fruit Farm,}at{Burnt {Heath, Fosseway, Offchurch,}are a further 2000 acres on four other farms owned by the family: 2 at{Offchurch, one each at{Bascote}and{Weston-under {Wetherley}and 4 rented farms at {Offchurch, Southam, Honiley}and {Fillongley. { 1000 acres}of{wheat}and{barley}are farmed by one member of the family + 4 workers. The corn is dried in the farm grain drier. A second family member + 5 workers grow{500 acres}of{potatoes}which are stored in half ton boxes, over Winter. A third family member + 4 workers work on{land drainage. Other crops grown are{500 acres}of {oil seed rape}and some{hay. The farm has a{machinery factory, making{tractor wheels,}using tyres imported from U.S.A.
